model.chess_set

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.chess_set.Board

  • public final class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Chess board for a Chess game. Instances of Board are owned by Game.
    Version:
    Mar 9, 2019
    Author:
    gemuelealudino, patricknogaj

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Board.Cell
      Represents a 'square' within a Chess board

      • getWhiteSet

        public PieceSet getWhiteSet()
        Accessor to retrieve the PieceSet for a white-piece Player
        Returns:
        the white PieceSet

      • getBlackSet

        public PieceSet getBlackSet()
        Accessor to retrieve the PieceSet for a black-piece Player
        Returns:
        the black PieceSet

      • getCell

        Board.Cell getCell(Position pos)
        Accessor to retrieve a particular Cell within the Board
        Parameters:
        pos - the Position of the desired Cell
        Returns:
        the Cell with the given file and rank of a Position

      • getLastMove

        public Move getLastMove()
        Accessor method to retrieve the last Move executed during gameplay
        Returns:
        the most recent Move that was logged by Board

      • getLastKill

        public Move getLastKill()
        Retrieves the last kill from the moveList
        Returns:
        the Move that describes the last piece to be killed, otherwise null if there are no pieces killed

      • movePiece

        public boolean movePiece(Piece piece,
                         PieceSet pieceSet,
                         Position newPosition,
                         PieceType promoType)
        Requested Piece will be moved to a Cell corresponding to the file and rank of newPosition, provided newPosition is a legal move for a given Piece
        Parameters:
        piece - accessed by a Player for a move
        newPosition - the new Position desired by the Player for a Piece
        promoType - the PieceType to promote param piece to (if eligible)
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • promotePawn

        public Piece promotePawn(Piece piece,
                         PieceSet pieceSet,
                         Position newPosition,
                         PieceType promoType)
        Promotes a pawn to a desired piece, provided conditions are met
        Parameters:
        piece - the Piece, which is a Pawn to be promoted
        pieceSet - the pieceSet from which the Piece belongs
        newPosition - the Position of the desired Cell for the PAWN
        promoType - the PieceType to promote the PAWN to
        Returns:
        the promoted Piece

      • checkPromoteWhite

        public boolean checkPromoteWhite()
        Called by Game::readInput, after Game::whitePlayMove completes its call, this is used to send a message to a Game instance that a WHITE pawn was promoted.
        Returns:
        If promoteWhite is true, the promoteWhite field will be reset to false, and the method returns true -- otherwise, returns false

      • checkPromoteBlack

        public boolean checkPromoteBlack()
        Called by Game::readInput, after Game::blackPlayMove completes its call, this is used to send a message to a Game instance that a BLACK pawn was promoted.
        Returns:
        If promoteBlack is true, the promoteBlack field will be reset to false, and the method returns true -- otherwise, returns false

      • getPawnPromoteType

        public PieceType getPawnPromoteType()
        Called by Game::readInput to determine the PieceType of a PAWN (PAWN_0, PAWN_1, ...)
        Returns:
        the PieceType of a PAWN to be promoted

      • moveLogToString

        public java.lang.String moveLogToString()
        Prints the log of moves as per the moveList field (ArrayList)

      • canCheck

        private boolean canCheck(Piece piece)
        This checks to see if the King on opposing side is checked
        Parameters:
        piece - - takes the current piece
        Returns:
        true if opponent King is checked || false is not.

      • isKingSafe

        private boolean isKingSafe(King k,
                           Position p)
        This checks to see if the King is safe.
        Parameters:
        k - - king object
        p - - position object
        Returns:
        true if any piece on opponent can move to the King's position

      • hasValidMoves

        private boolean hasValidMoves(King k)
        Checks to see the valid moves a King can make to decide if he will be checked or checkmated.
        Parameters:
        k - - king object
        Returns:
        true if King is able to move somewhere without being in risk of check

      • checkmate

        private void checkmate(King king)
        Executes upon checkmate, and game ends
        Parameters:
        king - king that was checked

      • assignWhitePieces

        private void assignWhitePieces()
        Used during Board instantiation: initialize all Piece and Cell instances to their default starting positions prior to beginning a Chess match

        Used during Board instantiation: initialize all Piece and Cell instances to their default starting positions prior to beginning a Chess match
